Name: Bermuda Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist &/or peach wedge.
Garnish with orange zest twist (expressed over cocktail) &/or peach wedge on rim.
Review: Gin with a sweetening touch of peach, orange and pomegranate.
History: Adapted from Victor Bergeron 's Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (1972 revised edition).
Nutrition: One serving of Bermuda Cocktail contains 204 calories
